basics.name: Lucas Galdino
basics.label: Student of biomedical sciences
basics.summary: I write code as a freelance and open-source developer, publish content on my YouTube channel and personal website, and study biomedical sciences at the Université du Québec de Trois-Rivières.

work.name: Pharmacie Jean-Coutu
work.summary: I managed patient files and documentation, communicated with medical and social-welfare, ordered medications, prepared and packaged narcotic and non-narcotic medication.

projects.name: Praxis
projects.summary: Praxis is an open-source universal mobile app for Orthodox Christians to quickly have access to their daily prayers, scripture readings, and fasting calendar.
